m_szDocTitle: From hoverboards to self-tying shoes: Predictions that Back to the Future II got right - Telegraph
m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Tuesday 19 July 2016  4:35PM BST 20 Oct 2015  textArticle -------------------- From hoverboards to self-tying shoes: Predictions that Back to the Future II got right  As we reach October 21 2015 - the day Marty and Doc travel to in Back to the Future II - which of the film's predictions have come true?  Sophie Curtis  4:35PM BST 20 Oct 2015  4:29pm on October 21, 2015. That was the moment Marty, Doc and Jennifer travelled to from 1985 in Back to the Future II.  The film's vision of the future wowed audiences when it was released in 1989, and over 25 years later, t
